message.content:
cs.NI, cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.SY, cs.DS

This paper discusses the use of Information-Centric Networking (ICN) and Named Data Networking (NDN) in the context of the Internet of Things (IoT) and smart cities. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture). The paper also addresses security concerns related to authentication and routing, which suggests the category cs.CR (Cryptography and Security). The scalability and efficiency of the proposed framework are evaluated through simulations, which could fall under cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) or cs.SY (Systems and Control). Finally, the paper proposes a novel framework, which could also be relevant to cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms).
